thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 3 of 541
thread.title: Tonya Wentink

author: Tonya Wentink
title: Tonya Wentink
text: I have loved all the outfits, jackets, vests. Who knew. Sizing for XL is great even for the bra top. I always wish for better support, but that is always the case. A few times I was not sure about something and then turned out I wore them a lot. And in the beginning I wasn't sure would order over and over. But I keep finding things I like. I have no problem rating this with great stars.
